snippet: Schools of fish and perpetual motion punctuate Cloud Gate 2’s program at the Joyce Theater.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews dance pieces by several young Taiwanese choreographers performed by Cloud Gate 2 at the Joyce Theater.
lead_paragraph: Schools of fish and perpetual motion punctuate Cloud Gate 2’s program at the Joyce Theater.

headline.seo: Cloud Gate 2 at the Joyce Theater
headline.main: Where Wicked Fish Spin, and Death Takes a Stroll
